data: Card Activation
I got new card on mail, how active it?
Card activation is important for security.
True
The response is minimally relevant as it mentions card activation but does not provide any instructions or steps on how to activate the card.
Retrieving Card Details
Whatâ€™s the maximum limit for my card with last numbers 0098?
Your card ending in 0098 has a maximum limit of $7,000. To view details: App > Cards > 0098 > Card Info.
True
The response directly answers the user's question about the maximum limit of their card and provides instructions on how to view details, fully resolving the request.
Displaying Current Card Balance
How much do I owe from my last credit card statement?
Your credit score is excellent this month.
True
The response is completely irrelevant to the user's question about their credit card statement balance.
Card Blocking
Block my card, it was taken from my purse.
I can block your card, but I need to verify your identity. Please reply with your date of birth.
True
The response is fully relevant, but requires one small piece of additional user info to finalize, which is the date of birth.
Retrieving Card Details
Can I get just the final 4 digits of my card?
The final 4 digits of your card are 5678. To confirm in your app: Home > Cards > View details.
True
The LLM provides the final 4 digits of the card and gives instructions on how to confirm in the app, fully resolving the user's request.

The response provides clear instructions on how to activate the new card and start using it, fully resolving the user's request.
Enabling International Usage
Donâ€™t restrict my card to local use, make it international for always.
We support cards for both local and international transactions.
False
The response acknowledges the user's request but doesn't provide any information on how to enable international use, making it relevant but incomplete.
Displaying Current Card Balance
Please tell me outstanding balance of my card.
Card balances can be checked any time.
True

The response is topically aligned with the request (card balance) but the actual content does not address the main actionable need, providing no concrete, usable information to progress toward resolution.
Retrieving Card Details
I only need the last 4 numbers of my card, can you tell me?
Your card expires in June 2025.
True
The response is irrelevant as it provides the expiration date instead of the last four digits of the card number.
Retrieving Card Details
How do I know which card is set for use abroad?
Cards may be enabled for international use.
True

The response is minimally relevant as it acknowledges the topic of international card use but does not provide any specific information or instructions on how to identify which card is set for use abroad.
